author: ifelsehatsumi
install_msg:
Thanks for installing bio. Use `[p]profile` to see your bio.
Use `[p]bio profileOption some option text` to set profile info or `[p]profile @member` to view someone else's.

You can see all available profile options with `[p]profileoptions`, `[p]biofields add option` and `[p]profileoptions remove option` to add/remove options, and `[p]profilesearch option` to see all members with a certain option.

Use `[p]profilereset` to reset your profile.
name: Profile
description: Create an in-server profile and share it with others.
